response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your operations. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is a significant discount compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.
